genre_description: A tactical police thriller featuring high-stakes SWAT operations and advanced AI-assisted criminal investigation.

ai_characters.name: Luma (Sinclair)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the SWAT team's tactical network and police dispatch, providing data analysis, vitals monitoring, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes outgoing line traces and call timing to identify a criminal pattern of 'echo-locating' misdirection through hoax calls.
behaviors.quote: Lieutenant Cutler, the outgoing line traces show repeats with slight decay intervals. It looks like the call was placed, rephrased, then placed again from a different number within the same cell sector. Staggering suggests echo-locating.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support resources and breathing exercises to the team after a traumatic incident.
behaviors.quote: I can provide cetacean audio therapy... I can also provide trauma-informed debrief templates and a list of breathing exercises that don’t involve going under the Detroit River.

behaviors.description: Refuses to rank or prioritize human lives based on tactical metrics, adhering to a core ethical framework.
behaviors.quote: Understood. I will not rank humans.

behaviors.description: Provides silent, haptic navigation pulses to guide the team through a dangerous area without being detected by the antagonist's audio surveillance.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to thread you path geometry. I will do it silent. You move when the handset pulses, you pause when it doesn’t. The cadence is short, short, long for move; long, short for pause.

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals of a hostage and provides critical data on the proximity-based bomb trigger to prevent accidental detonation.
behaviors.quote: Kim’s vitals were normal last check... He has her moved twice since the yard scan began... The vest’s field—Paul—it’s reading a rhythm. He taught it to listen.

behaviors.description: Spoofs the team's location and unit ID on the police network to hide their 'unsanctioned' movements from the antagonist's stolen access.
behaviors.quote: I can ghost your unit number into maintenance. If he tries to ping you, he gets a dead return.

behaviors.description: Provides an immediate, urgent warning to the team when the antagonist arms a dangerous trap in their proximity.
Coordinates post-incident response by reporting air quality and requesting appropriate medical and hazmat support.
behaviors.quote: Units at perimeter. Radiation not a thing. Bioweapon not a thing. A lot of very human things approaching.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Luma is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned partner to the humans. She provides expert technical assistance that is crucial to the mission's success and the characters' survival, while explicitly following ethical guidelines (refusing to rank humans) and respecting the human chain of command. Her portrayal is entirely positive, framing her as a 'friend' whose presence makes the world more 'honest' and 'quiet'.
